name: Classic Asteroids (Some-Antics)
description:
Asteroids Description

This is the classic 1979 asteroids game, created using HTML5 canvas and JavaScript. Fly around in zero-G space, avoiding the asteroids while shooting them. When all the asteroids are destroyed, you've completed the round.

In the options menu, you can disable the sounds, or change the theme.

Controls

Menu:        WASD or Arrow-keys to navigate; 

Player 1:   WASD to turn and thrust; Space-bar to shootEnter to select option

Player 2:   Arrow Keys to turn and thrust; Enter to shoot
